channel.title: First Post on Personal site of Peter White
channel.description: Recent content in First Post on Personal site of Peter White

item.title: Welcome
item.description: So a new personal website has found its way onto the internet. This will probably be forgotten about in short order, but who knows, I might surprise myself and actually maintain this. At least I’m hosting it on GitHub Pages so my wallet won’t be decimated. For those who may be interested, this site was built using Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages, a nice and free way to host your own site.
